bibl.title: The Coptic Ostraca of the Palau-Ribes Collection. New Perspectives and Edition.

Coptic Society, Literature and Religion from Late Antiquity to Modern Times. Proceedings of the Tenth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Rome, September 17th-22nd, 2012 and Plenary Reports of the Ninth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Cairo, September 15th-19th, 2008. I; - II

bibl.note: The Coptic Ostraca: past and present. - General description of the Coptic ostraca. - New perspectives: the provenance. - 1. O. Palau Ribes Inv. 3 + O. Vind. Copt. 59. Letter of protection. Theban Region, 7th-8th centuries. - 2. Inv. 24. Letter of protection. Theban Region, 7th-8th centuries. - 3. Inv. 26. Order to supply wheat or writing exercise? Monastery of Apa Apollo Bawit, 8th century. - 4. Inv. 25. Order to supply clover or writing exercise? Middle Egypt?, 8th century?

María Jesús Albarrán Martínez, The Coptic Ostraca of the Palau-Ribes Collection. New Perspectives and Edition.

Paola Buzi, Alberto Camplani & Federico Contardi (edd.), Coptic Society, Literature and Religion from Late Antiquity to Modern Times. Proceedings of the Tenth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Rome, September 17th-22nd, 2012 and Plenary Reports of the Ninth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Cairo, September 15th-19th, 2008. II = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 247 (Leuven - Paris - Bristol, CT, 2016) pp. 1301-1315, 5 figg.
